ti:edition.ti:label: Βιβλιοθήκη Ἱστορική (Books 11-17)
ti:edition.ti:description: Diodorus of Sicily. Vols. 4-8 (partial). C. H. Oldfather, C. H.; Sherman, Charles L.; Welles, C. Bradford; editors. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press; London: William Heinemann, Ltd., 1946-1963 (printing).

ti:edition.ti:label: Βιβλιοθήκη Ἱστορική (Books 1-5)
ti:edition.ti:description: Diodorus Siculus. Diodori Bibliotheca Historica. Vols. 1-2 (partial). Bekker, Immanuel; Dindorf, Ludwig; Vogel, Friedrich; editors. Leipzig: Teubner, 1888-1890.

ti:edition.ti:label: Βιβλιοθήκη Ἱστορική (Books 18-20)
